mapper.insert: insert into ds_gmvpercent( city_name,storeno,store_name,totalamount,jwsamount,yanglaoamount,weichaoamount,specvalue, year,month,createtime) values( #{city_name},#{storeno},#{store_name},#{totalamount},#{jwsamount}, #{yanglaoamount},#{weichaoamount},#{specvalue}, YEAR(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)),MONTH(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)),NOW() )
mapper.delete: delete from ds_gmvpercent where year =#{year} and month =#{month}
